Package org.tinyradius.proxy

Class RadiusProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tinyradius.server.RadiusServer
      • org.tinyradius.proxy.RadiusProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Lifecycle
    public class RadiusProxy
extends RadiusServer
implements Lifecycle
    This class implements a basic Radius proxy that receives Radius packets and forwards them to a Radius server.

    You have to provide a handler that handles incoming requests.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RadiusProxy

        public RadiusProxy​(io.netty.channel.EventLoopGroup eventLoopGroup,
                   io.netty.channel.ChannelFactory<? extends io.netty.channel.socket.DatagramChannel> factory,
                   java.net.InetAddress listenAddress,
                   ProxyHandlerAdapter channelInboundHandler,
                   int authPort,
                   int acctPort)
        Parameters:
        eventLoopGroup - for both channel IO and processing
        factory - to create new Channel
        listenAddress - local address to bind to, will be wildcard address if null
        channelInboundHandler - ProxyChannelInboundHandler to handle requests received on both authPort and acctPort. Should also implement Lifecycle as the handler is expected to manage the socket for proxying.
        authPort - port to bind to, or set to 0 to let system choose
        acctPort - port to bind to, or set to 0 to let system choose
